articles.description: US study finds a very strong association between beneficial bacteria in the bladder and the use of estrogen hormone therapy in postmenopausal women. ‘Estrogen supplementation can certainly break the cycle of recurrent infections. Focus on preventives,’ says g…
articles.content: Why are older women more prone to urinary tract infections (UTIs)? Turns out their falling estrogen levels are to blame. Researchers at the University of Texas at Dallas have identified specific bact… [+5028 chars]
